pr_title: Log message for FileNotFound exception not clear enough #1365

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this still confusing? FileNotFoundException suggests that no parsing happened, because the file does not exist. So the message shout rather say that the given path does not exist.
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText:
Yes I agree. I've overcombined it all. I'll change it to "File {} can not be found".
This will work in a case that the file doesn't exist or for example if target resource is a folder.
replies.author: JiriOndrusek
